rules.description: All Dragonborn gain two features, determined by their subrace: (1) resistance to a specific element (improves to immunity at character level 9) and (2) an Elemental Breath cantrip. Breath costs an Action, cone 6m/20ft, attack roll vs all targets. Damage scales: L1 1d12; L5 2d12 and condition lasts 3 turns; L9 3d12+12. Spellcasting attribute is determined by the class in which you have the most levels.

subraces.name: Lolth-Sworn Drow
subraces.description: Cast Silence as an Action once per combat.

subraces.name: Seldarine Drow
subraces.description: Cast Misty Step as a Bonus Action once per combat.

rules.description: All Drow gain Superior Darkvision, granting the ability to see in magical darkness. Additionally, while shrouded in total darkness they make all Attack Rolls with Advantage.

subraces.name: Gold Dwarf
subraces.description: Gain a +2 bonus to all damage dealt with weapons. (Does not include unarmed attacks.)

subraces.name: Shield Dwarf
subraces.description: Reduce all damage taken by 2. (Calculated after Resistances and stacks with all other sources of Damage Reduction.)

subraces.name: Duergar
subraces.description: Cast Enlarge on yourself as a Bonus Action once per combat. Duergar gain Superior Darkvision, granting the ability to see in magical darkness. Additionally, while shrouded in total darkness they make all Attack Rolls with Advantage.

subraces.name: High Elf
subraces.description: Gain Advantage on all Wisdom based Ability Checks and Saving Throws.

subraces.name: Wood Elf
subraces.description: Movement speed is increased by 6m/20ft.

rules.description: When making any Attack Roll, add your Proficiency Bonus to the roll twice.

subraces.name: Rock Gnome
subraces.description: Armour Class is increased by 2.

subraces.name: Forest Gnome
subraces.description: Cast Dominate Beast as an Action once per combat. Forest Gnomes have the ability to Speak With Animals at all times.

subraces.name: Deep Gnome
subraces.description: Cast Invisibility on yourself as a Bonus Action once per combat. Deep Gnomes gain Superior Darkvision, granting the ability to see in magical darkness. Additionally, while shrouded in total darkness they make all Attack Rolls with Advantage.

subraces.description: Gain Advantage on all Wisdom based Ability Checks.

subraces.name: Wood Half-Elf
subraces.description: Movement speed is increased by 3m/10ft.

subraces.name: Drow Half-Elf
subraces.description: Gain Superior Darkvision, granting them the ability to see in magical darkness. Additionally, while shrouded in total darkness they make all Attack Rolls with Advantage.

rules.description: All Half-Elves gain a +1 bonus to Initiative.
Gain a +1 bonus to Initiative, as well as Advantage on all Strength based Ability Checks.

subraces.name: Strongheart Halfling

subraces.name: Mephistopheles Tiefling

subraces.name: Zariel Tiefling
subraces.description: Cast Heat Metal as an Action once per combat.

rules.description: All Tieflings gain Resistance to Fire and Basic Darkvision, granting them the ability to see in darkness. Additionally, they gain the ability to cast a specific spell once per combat. This spell scales with character level, being treated as if cast with a higher level spell slot at third level and every odd level thereafter. Spellcasting attribute is determined by the class in which you have the most levels.
